shared_text:
Ludlow Fire Department
October 7, 2019 at 8:23 PM ·

This week is fire safety week. Kindergarten, First and Second grade students visited the firehouse today. During this visit we talked about the theme of the week, to Plan and Practice your Escape. We empowered them to be a hero by asking you, their family, about their home escape plan. Take the time tonight to work on your family home escape plan, before it’s too late.

A home escape plan includes working smoke alarms on every level of the home, and near all the sleeping areas. It also includes two ways out of every room like a door and a window. A clear path to a meeting place that is safely away like a tree, mailbox or light pole. Practice this plan twice a year. We also discussed closing doors to bedrooms as they sleep.
